message: Let's be fair and reasonable, 60-40 is a good starting point.
Your offer was a bit too lopsided Alice.  Let's be more realistic.  This is my counter offer.
I've thought about it, and I can go a bit lower, but 58-42 is as fair as I'm willing to go for now.
Alice, this is getting us nowhere. A 50/50 split is the fairest and quickest way to end this.
